column1: "description": "This data provides all India (2001 to 2011) and state-wise (2009 to 2011) details on number of cognizable crime under Indian Penal Code (IPC) and strength of police force."
"title": "All India and State-wise Number Of Cognizable Crime Under IPC And Strength Of Police Force "

column2: Total Number of IPC cases for Investigation including pending Cases from previous year
column3: Actual Strength of Police force - Civil
column4: Actual Strength of Police force - Armed
column5: Actual Strength of Police force - Total
column6: Number of policemen per 100 square Kilometres of Area
column7: Number of policemen per 1000 of population
column8: Number of IPC cases per Civil Policeman
